topics.name: Mathematics
topics.description: The study of numbers, quantities, shapes, and patterns.

subtopics.name: Algebra 1 & 2
subtopics.description: The branch of mathematics dealing with symbols and the rules for manipulating those symbols.

subtopics.name: Geometry
subtopics.description: The branch of mathematics concerned with the properties and relations of points, lines, surfaces, and solids.

subtopics.name: Calculus
subtopics.description: The mathematical study of continuous change, dealing with derivatives and integrals.

subtopics.name: Statistics
subtopics.description: The branch of mathematics dealing with data collection, analysis, interpretation, and presentation.

subtopics.name: Pre-calculus
subtopics.description: A course that prepares students for calculus, covering algebraic and trigonometric concepts.

topics.name: Science
topics.description: The systematic enterprise that builds and organizes knowledge in the form of testable explanations and predictions about the universe.

subtopics.name: Physics
subtopics.description: The branch of science concerned with the nature and properties of matter and energy.

subtopics.name: Chemistry
subtopics.description: The branch of science that studies the composition, structure, properties, and change of matter.

subtopics.name: Biology
subtopics.description: The science that studies living organisms, their life processes, and their interactions with the environment.

subtopics.name: Environmental Science
subtopics.description: The study of the Earth and its components, including geology, meteorology, oceanography, and astronomy.

topics.name: English
topics.description: The study of the English language, its literature, and its composition.

subtopics.name: Literature Analysis
subtopics.description: The body of written works, including poetry, prose, and drama, that express ideas and emotions.

subtopics.name: Essay Writing
subtopics.description: The act of writing, especially in a structured and coherent manner.

subtopics.name: Grammar and Syntax
subtopics.description: The set of structural rules governing the composition of clauses, phrases, and words in a language.

subtopics.name: Research Skills
subtopics.description: The ability to locate, evaluate, and use information effectively for academic purposes.

topics.name: History
topics.description: The study of past events, particularly in human affairs.

subtopics.name: World History
subtopics.description: The study of global historical events, cultures, and civilizations.

subtopics.name: U.S. History
subtopics.description: The history of the United States from its founding to the present day.

subtopics.name: Economics
subtopics.description: The study of the production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services.

subtopics.name: Government & Civics
subtopics.description: The study of political systems, government structures, and civic responsibilities.
